sceneDescription.title: Chilon the Greek Spying in Night Streets

setting.time: 64 AD, evening, night falling over city
setting.location: Busy street in Subura district, torch-lit thoroughfare
setting.weather: Cool night air, no wind, torches burning steadily

characters.appearance: Chilon Chilonides, elderly Greek philosopher in his sixties, cunning eyes, bent frame from years of scheming
characters.clothing: Worn Greek himation cloak, patched tunic, rope sandals, staff for walking and protection
characters.position: Skulking through narrow Subura streets, staying in shadows between torches
characters.action: Following suspected Christians to discover their meeting places, hoping to betray them for Roman gold

scene.mainElements: Narrow cobblestone street lined with shops and taverns, iron torch brackets casting pools of flickering light, mix of artificial illumination
scene.details: Torches creating overlapping circles of warm orange light with deep shadows between, oil lamps glowing in shop windows, people moving between pools of light, smoke from torches creating hazy atmosphere, cobblestones gleaming wetly in firelight, laundry hanging from upper windows barely visible
scene.background: Five-story insulae rising into darkness above torch light, distant sounds of tavern conversation and music, other night figures moving through shadows
scene.atmosphere: Urban night filled with espionage and betrayal, torch light revealing and concealing secrets, sounds of pursuit and hiding echoing through streets, sense of hunter and hunted in dangerous game

composition.cameraAngle: Eye level following watchman down torch-lit street
composition.focus: Torch-bearing figure moving through alternating light and shadow
composition.depth: Foreground cobblestones in torch light, middle ground watchman with flame, background buildings disappearing into darkness
